title: Doubt whether it's original
body: I've heard great things about this brand but the product wasn't upto my expectation. The soaps were a little out of shape and there's absolutely no scent or smell. A little disappointed:(

title: 'Very bad packaging'
body: No complaint about the product but beware that it might reach you in this state. They didn't bother using a box to send it. The cover packet is torn and soap bits have come out. The soaps have also been deformed.

title: 'Delivered packet was not in good condition.'
body: 'Product received was not in good condition. It was humidified. The packing was not properly sealed. And hence shop absorbed water and it was wet inside. Soap packing was damaged. Soap shape was damaged due to improper handling as you can see in picture. Fragrance was good. I have used this soap before also. Quality is same as pears.'

title: 'Terrible Packing. Received damaged soaps.'
body: 'Khadi brand is good. The quality is nice but it gets consumed very quickly. The packing was way below amazon standards due to which I received damaged soaps.'

title: 'FULLY SATISFIED WITH THE PRODUCT AND HAVE NO HESITATION TO RECOMMEND ...'
body: 'FULLY SATISFIED WITH THE PRODUCT AND HAVE NO HESITATION TO RECOMMEND TO OTHERS. PRICE IS ON A BIT HIGHER SIDE. UNLESS REDUCED BY SOME EXTENT
column5: YOU WOULD FACE A UP-HILL TASK IN PROMOTING THE ITEM AGAINST SO MANY OVER-SEAS PRODUCTS AVAILABLE IN THE MARKET. I WOULD SUGGEST A 25 % CUT IN ITS PRICE. GOOD LUCK.'
